attributes.action: send cats to iraq in medieval battle armour  mounted on weasels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
troops in iraq are dieing, i feel it is time the domestic pet payed us back for all the feeding and fussing they get, so they should do some national service!
cats are smaller making them better at concealing them selves against terrorists and can then pursue the enemy in their knightly battle armour and slay them all

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
